text: Sir Cosmo Dugal Patrick Thomas Haskard KCMG MBE (25 November 1916 â€“ 21 February 2017) was an Irish-born British colonial administrator and retired British Army officer. He was born in Dublin. He served as Governor of the Falkland Islands from 1964 through 1970. He turned 100 in November 2016. Haskard died on 21 February 2017 in Bantry Bay, County Cork, Ireland, aged 100.Death Notice of Sir Cosmo Haskard ==References== Category:1916 births Category:2017 deaths Category:British diplomats Category:British centenarians Category:People from Dublin Category:Governors of the Falkland Islands
title: Cosmo Haskard
